channel.title: Keyboard on Not A Rocket Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Keyboard on Not A Rocket Scientist

item.title: Add A Photo Grid To The Post
item.description: Recently, I have the idea of adding some photos taken by me at the end of a post. I do not have a professional camera, and I just use my mobile phone. This is just for fun and for the sake of record keeping. The idea I have in mind is to show a 3-by-3 photo grid at the end of the post, because I like a 3-by-3 grid. Everybody likes 3-by-3 grids, right? In Chinese, we call it “九宫格”.
